Conference Room Reservation


Select a slot below to reserve room 1407A in the Quest Lab. Please make sure to fill out the information in the description box. The room is equipped with a telephone and Mondopad. Please don't schedule more than a two hour time slot. If you need to cancel your reservation please email Rachel (rdidonna@rhssmith.umd.edu).


Location

1407 Van Munching Hall
7699 Mowatt Lane
University of Maryland
College Park, MD 20742
